Base Pay.message: There is a discrepancy with Base Pay. This is often attributed to a change in grade or years of service that occured during the month. However, it can sometimes be due to an inaccurate Pay Entry Base Date (PEBD) which is used to calculate years of service.

BAS.message: There is a discrepancy with the BAS. This sometimes happens when the BAS dataset has not been recently updated.

BAH.message: There is a discrepancy with the BAH. This may be due to recent changes in locality rates.

Federal Taxes.message: There is a discrepancy with Federal Taxes. This may be due to differences in withholding or filing status.

FICA - Social Security.message: There is a discrepancy with FICA - Social Security. This may be due to reaching the Social Security wage base limit.

FICA - Medicare.message: There is a discrepancy with FICA - Medicare. This may be due to additional Medicare tax withholding for high earners.

SGLI Rate.message: There is a discrepancy with the SGLI Rate. This sometimes happens when the SGLI rate dataset has not been recently updated.

State Taxes.message: There is a discrepancy with State Taxes. This may be due to differences in state tax rates or withholding.
